text:
Konichiwa Begum-san(aka yadav aka Playboy) 

Tumne to shuru se hi jalwe dikha diye theğŸ˜‚. Abhi bhi yaad hai 1st sem mai walk pr gye the aur kaafi saari baatein kri thi 2-3 ghante. Tabse ab tak saath nhi chootha hai. Kaafi kuch kiya yaar saath mai, apan log to hamesha hi saath rehte the. Courses apan ne saath mai nhi kiye, pr uske alawa baaki time saath hi rehte the. Chuddu, Begum aur chaman. Vikram k saath to kaafi maze kiye. Library, CCD, DOAA canteen, OAT har jagah. Koi bhi session attend krne aate the, aur phir enthu mai aa jate the dono ki coding krenge, aur phir hamesha ki tarah saara enthu nipat jaata thağŸ˜‚. Summer camp mai alag g**nd mari thi. Saath mai hi rehte the garmi mai. Blueworld gye the, kaafi patle ho gye the us time pr. Deadpool 2 dekhne gye the shayad Verma k saath, Raazi dekhne gye the Akshat aur Arnav k saath. 

2nd year mai khub Pubg khela apan ne. Tera room gaming room ban gya tha. Friday ko to tukda, Verma, mai aur tum puri puri raat bas PUBG hi khelte the. Kya din the yaar, tension nhi thi, kaafi suljha hua tha sab. Aur ab dekho, tere ko pta hi hai sab. Goa ki trip bhi sahi thi. Aap to score krke aaye the ğŸ˜‚. Aur hum log update le rhe the pal pal ke. Rajasthan trip bhi badiya thi, kahaniya sunte sunate rehte the ek dusre ko. Aur itni duur jaakr book lane k liye thanks!

Placement ki prep bhi sath hi kr rhe the. Sab saath hi kiya hai apan ne. Last sem mai wo acting bhi acchi kri thi OAT rooftop prğŸ˜‚. 

Milna to hota rhega hi apna, bas dhyan rakho apna. Baaki to baat krke yaad kr lenge kisse. You guys mean a lot to me.
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text:
Akshatboi aka ricchie aka chotu
Ye thoda late aaya tha campus mai, to mere ko kaafi uncertainty thi ki yaar kaisa banda hoga, jamming baithegi ki nhi. And then we met. Aur sab kuch kaafi acche se ho gya. Pura saal nikal gya aur pta nhi chala. Kaafi kisse hue. And he bacame an important part of me. I don't share things with lot of people. But he is that person, jiske saath mai sab kuch share krta hu. Our friendship has become too precious for me. Kabhi bhi kuch hota hai, I seek his advice first. Kaafi rational banda hai. Kaafi kuch kiya 4 saalo mai. Even online sem mai bhi kaafi kuch ho gyağŸ˜…. 

1st year mai kaafi golu molu tha, pr kaafi kam time mai ekdum slim ho gya. Fully dedicated tha tennis mai, pr saare sports mai accha hai. TA101 ne g**nd le li thi iski. Kaafi courses kare saath mai, kaafi maja aaya, MOS, ERP, DS, ESC201. Sirf 1st year ki Antaragni saath mai attend kri thi, but it was worth it. 1 rajasthan ki trip saath mai ho gyi thi, aur kaafi maja aaya usme, kaafi kisse sunna sunana hua. Verma ki cycle terrace or chahdhayi thi, wo bhi sahi kaa d kiya tha. Khub football khela, aur kaafi kuch seekha bhi isse.

Jyada nhi likhunga, because I think we know and understand each other's importance (aur time bhi kam haiğŸ˜…). 

Milte hai fatafat se.
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text:
Hi. 
It was great working with you in SPO. Kaafi accha tenura the SPO wala, got to know a lot of people and learnt a lot. Tune to pure Placement season mai Chocolate maang kr pareshan kr diya tha. Accha hua is din wo chikki mil gyi, wrna to pta nhi kya hotağŸ˜…. Agli baar agar milna hua to pakka chocolate lekr aaunga. 
Stay in touch.
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text: Yo, kaafi time se baat nhi hui apni. Milte hai ek baar fully vaccinated hone k baad. Kaafi sahi term the waise, bas corona ne maja kharaab kr diya. Abhi bhi yaad hai orientation k time hum logo ko stars aur constellations dikhata rehta tha pure time. Zumba ka tera dance bhi yaad hai. Aur wo pehli baar enthu mai mere ko library le kr gya tha, mere ko neend aa rhi thiğŸ¤£. Waha pr mai koi astronomy ki book padhne lag gya tha ğŸ˜‚. Aur phir uske baad tu khud kabhi library nhi gya hoga shayad.  Mini militia se start kiya tha. Tere room mai pura squad baith jaata tha. Then PUBG to football. Kaafi maje kiye. Bas contact mai rehna, baat krte rehna. All the best for your future.
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text: Aur Kalam Kamboj, bahut shayriya nikal rhi hai aajkl. Tune bahut pareshan kiya mere koğŸ˜‚. Tera wo Harlem shake ka dance best tha. Tera 1st year ka excuse GPL na hone k liye, kya hi excuse banaya tha. Aur wo jo Techkriti wala prank kiya tha tere saath, that was the best. 1st year mai to shayad hi baat hui ho apni, mujhe to jaanta bhi nhi tha tu, aur Sohail ko bahut pareshan kiya tune. 2nd year se department k courses k sath jaan pehchan bani. Bahut ghisa hai yaar 2-3rd year mai civil ki labs mai. Pr saath mai tu entertain krta rehta tha. Aur wo last semester ka photoshoot to hamesha yaad rhegağŸ˜‚. Ek se ek pose diye the bhai tune. Wo kabhi nhi bhul paunga mai chah kr bhi. Bas baat krte rehna yu hi, aur shayriya sunate rehna. Bye :)
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text: Paaji, bas thoda tension lena kam kr do, baaki to sab changa hai. Bhaut tension leta hai tu bhai. Thoda chill maara kar. Teri aur Kamboj ki alag hi dosti thi. Last semeseter to kya hunt pr nikalte the tum log raat mai. Campus last night ko jab tumhari ladai hui thi, to mast maje le rhe the hum log bhi, wo raat bhi alag thi kaafi. Bas contact mai rehna, aur Gym krte rehna. Bye :)
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text:
Ye is bande ne puri wing mai cheemsi faila diya hai, sab infected hai. Bas din bhar cheems k memes share krta rehta hai.

Campus k 1st day dekha tha use, room set krke room k bahar ghum rha tha. Ekdum cute sa, golu molu sa dikh rha tha. Pr ye to "Mai dikhta hu Sweet, innocent, Swami type ka pr hu bade harami type ka" wala case nikla. 

1st year mai to kitna roya hai ye. Advance mai sab padhkr rakhta tha, phir bhi baad mai tension mai rota tha. Pr phir 1st sem k baad ekdum se change ho gya. Jitna 1st sem mai roya, usse kayi jyada hasa, aur hasaya isne hum sabko. Lambora, Yadav se fight k alag kisse hai. Itni to recordings hai iski. Jitne kaand is bande ne kiye hai, utne kisi ne nhi kiye. 2nd sem mai Kamboj ka prank call, Goa ki return tickets ka kaand etc.

Literally 2nd year was the best year of the campus life. Wo room ka trio bhi kaafi sahi tha. Kitna Pubg khela tha udhar. Tune ESC201 padhya tha, aur phir uski treat di thi maine pure 200 rs ki ğŸ˜‚. Phir wo "Chaabi kaha hai" and "TP bhola bhala sa" bhi wahi shoot kiya tha. 

3rd year mai teri jo cycle gayab kri thi humne, kya chutiya kaata tha bhaiğŸ˜‚. Tune CCTV nikalwaya tha. Baaki 3rd year to aise hi nikal gya yaar. Pr saari kasar nikaal li last k 50 days mai. Kaafi maja kiya yaar. DMCA k matches rkhna, among us khelna, pubg khelna. Aur wo tumhara drunk wala kaand to kabhi nhi bhulunga. Tu aise to kaafi harami hai, pr kaafi sensitive bhi hai andar se(not talking about b**bies). Jyada dil pr na lagaya kr cheezo ko.

Bas aise hi hmare saath PUBG khelo, aur milte rehna. Teri shaadi mai to pakka aunga maiğŸ˜‚. Bas tab tk k liye bye.

PS: Tu tension mt lena, agar mar jayega to mereko pta hai kya Krna hai
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text: Yo. Tere ko MOS k tutorials mai notice kiya tha 1st time. 1st number pr teri attendence lagti thi, aur uske baad meri. Pure time bas tracksuit mai dikhta tha. Phir TA201 lab mai same project mai the. Mere ko to darr lagta tha tere se ki bahut jyada sincere baccha hai, dhang se kaam nhi kiya to complaint kr dega, pr tu to kaafi chill banda nikla. Uske baad to kaafi pati apni. Aur maximum courses ki labs mai saath mai hi the apan. Kaafi help kari tune throughout this whole time. GI ne to le hi li thi ek tarah se, pr tere project ne bacha liya. GI ki lab krte the dhoop mai, pura campus naap daala tha. Aur phir us time jo discussion hote the, I really miss them a lot. Unicorn hunting se lekr movies, tv shows k discussions. Kaafi assignment tere hi chaape maine. Exams k time library mai baithe rehte the pure time. Shaam ko DOAA canteen chale jaate the samose khane. Alag hi time tha, pta nhi kab nikal gya. Bas research krte rehna, and hope ki tumhara abroad jaane ka dream bhi pura ho jaye. Baat krte rehna, apan to 1-1 ghanta baat krte rehte the pta hi nhi chalta tha. Bas aise hi call krte rehna. All the best...
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text:
Ramji, tere saath songs cover krne the. Wo nhi ho paya. Ramji k paas sab kuch available rehta tha, jo bhi chahiye, Ramji se maang lo, speaker, screwdriver set, fairy lights, paper cutter.... Aur saara jugaad bhi Ramji k paas hi rehta tha. Quiz ya exam se thodi der pehle aa jaya krta tha ki padha do. Sab yaad aata hai ab. Goa ki trip, bahar movie dekhne jaana, restaurant jana....

Milenge phir se, jamming krnege is baar. Stay in touch.
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text: Tu to 1st day se hi yaad hai, mujhe nhi laga tha ki tu haryana se hoga. Shuru se hi tension me tha, fees submit nhi hui thi teri. Quite disciplined, hard working and mature. Aur kaafi healthy lifestyle hai teri. Majaak kaafi banate the tera, pr we used to discuss ki yaar Lambo jaisi lifestyle acchi hai. Dudh aur dahi ka deewanapan. Aur crisis k time pr tera maturely behave Krna, kaafi time pr lead bhi acche se kiya tune. Verma ne jab 31k thukwaye the, tab tune hi kaafi shaanti se react kiya tha. Pr Return journey mai Delhi mai kaand bhi krwa diye theğŸ˜‚. And athlete to hai hi ekdum awesome. Bas apni philosophy k saath chalte rehna, chahe koi kuch bhi bole. All the best for the future. Stay in touch. Bye :)
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text: Sandeep bhaiya aur unka gyaan, chupaye nhi chipta. Kaisi bhi conversation ho, koi bhi topic ho, Sandeep bhaiya k paas hamesha kuch gyaan hota hai. Itna gyaan kaha se batora bhaiya aapne? Hume bhi bta dena, kahi UPSC mai na aajaye xD. Jo bhi ho, hasa jarur deta tha hum logo ko kuch na kuch bolkr. Aur wo campus ki last night, kya hasaya tha tune. Basketball badhiya sikhaya tha tune. Bas aise hi haste hasate rehna, aur khush rehna. Contact mai rehna. Bye :)
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text: Yaar tujhe starting se hi hamari wing mai hona tha. Sirf 1 semester hi tha tu hamari wing mai, pr aisa laga nhi. Kaafi jaldi ghul gya tha wingies k saath. Kaafi football khela saath mai. Aur wo DOSA wala scene to kabhi nhi bhul payengeğŸ˜‚. Stay in touch and keep smiling. Bye :)
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text:
The slowest person I've ever met. High hokr to slowmo mai chala gya the ye. Apni cycle kabhi bhi repair nhi krwayi, humesha dusro ki cycle pr jaata tha. 2nd sem mai TA101 ki lab mai mere peeche baith kr gya tha pure sem. Tabhi wo Nisheet ka peecha kiya tha, jab wo rickshaw chala rha tha. Bakchod tha wo chaseğŸ˜‚. Pr meri cycle k shockers change krwane pad gye the mere ko iske wajan k karan. 

But itna hardworking and cool banda bhi nhi dekha. Swag to hai launde ka. Kaafi code kiya hai 4 saal, aur mehnat bhi rang layi. Kahi koi bhi problem hoti thi code mai, to isko ko message kr deta tha, aur ye resolve bhi kr deta tha.

 Aur 4 saal mai is bande ko kabhi bhi gussa hote nhi dekha, chahe kuch bhi ho jaye.

Bina drunk ya high hue acting kaise krte hai, wo koi unse seekhe. Aur koi bhi moment ko befikr hokr enjoy kaise Krna hai, wo isse acche se koi nhi kr skta. Goa se Delhi aaye the tab wo Har aur Hawaiian shirt pehen kr chutiya to lag rha tha ekdum, but isne koi fucks dene hi nhi duniya koğŸ˜‚. 

Bas aise hi apna swag maintain Krna. Aasha krte hai aap khub tarrakki karoge. All the best. Bye :). Aur touch mai rehna.
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text:
Sohail aka miya aka pizzaboy aka tnk. Aate hi gir gya thağŸ˜‚. Wo moment to nhi bhulunga mai. Kya ball dodge kri thi. 

Shuru mai to itni baat nhi hoti thi, but then dheere dheere baat shuru hui. Din aur Raat bhar PUBG khelne lag gye the. Phir pomker bhi sikha diya tumne.

Kitne momos, pizza saath mai khaye hai. Aur wo basketball court pr cricket k matches, among us yaad ayega.

Last sem mai tera vengeance dekh kr darr gya tha kaafi, Verma se to accha badla liya, vikram se lena reh gya. Mujhe bhi lapetne wala tha tu, pr bach gya mai. Kaafi maja kiya last sem mai to. 
Wo rooftop wali acting ko to compare nhi kr skte, kya emotions daale the tune us shot mai toğŸ˜‚. 

Kaafi kuch yaad ayega. Apan to kota wasi hai, milte rhenge. Bas thoda nutritious food khana shuru kr de, aur wajan badha apna. Milte hai bas thode dino mai.
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text:
Tpboss. Isse jyada saaf dil ka banda nhi hoga wing mai. Jitna kaam isne 3 saal CS mai kiya hoga, utna to koi full time job wala banda nhi kr paata hoga 3 saal mai. Oracle ki kismat acchi hai tp jaisa employee milağŸ˜‚. 

Orientation k week se dhyan hai, shirt mai rehta tha, aur baar baar "Basically" krta rehta tha. Usme baad jo treasure hunt mai ra*ing k time isne innovative gaali baki thiğŸ˜‚, aur wo jo Buzzer roundğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Wo cheekh abhi tak kaan mai ghunzti krti hai. Subah subah PE mai jo exercises krke bahut g*nd maari isne baccho ki.

Jo kaam krta hai, puri shiddat se krta hai. Kaafi treats kari hai, kaafi ghumne gye bahar. Pr tu max times to CS k kaam ki wajah se jaata hi nhi tha, but phir bhi kaafi enjoy kiya saath mai. Mocha treat pr gye the, waha Jindal ne bhand krwa diya tha tere ko, wo sahi thağŸ˜‚. 

Meri to kaafi help kri isne, Tarak Mehta to tha hi tu. Academics, general advices, electronics, hardware....har issue resolve kr deta tha. Cricket aur football bhi khela saath mai. Iski Fast bowling kabhi jheli nhi gyi mere se. 

Last sem mai kaafi maze kiye saath mai. Wo rooftop pr jo videoshoot kiya tha, wo bhi 1 number tha. Aur jo tune aankhe badi krke daraya thağŸ˜‚. And that photoshoot, sab kuch kitna accha tha yaar. Tere saath trip nhi hui 1 bhi, hopefully wo ho jayegi. Bas aur kya, baat to krte rhenge hi, aur milte bhi rhenge bhi.
author: Samarthya  Sahu

text:
Chuddu k saath to itna time nikla jitna likhe kam hai. Iske mood swings ka koi jawab nhi. Aur room mai jaane se darr lagta tha iske, bina knock kiye chale jao to scar ho jaye, aisi possibilities rehti thi. 

Orientation k time jab kisi k naam yaad nhi the, to isko "Tez tez bolne wala ladka" k naam se jaante the. 1st year mai to kya kehne inke. 2-3 ladkiyo k saath hi rehte the hamesha, uske baad jo aakal aaya, wo 4 saal tk khatm nhi hua. Aur Akshay ki recording ne to tehalka macha diya tha. Tabse to naam padhne shuru ho gye the , Mr. M, m*thiya, Jordan. MTH k problem set ratta maarta tha khatarnaak. 1st sem mai to alag hi swag tha bhai kağŸ˜‚. P.E. se bhaagte hue pakda gya thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. 

College to Chaman, chuddu, Begum k bina adhura hi hai. Kitne maje maare saath mai. Same department mai the, tu padhata rehta tha mere ko aur Kamboj ko. Exams k time library mai baithe rehte the Tanmay k saath. Phir shaam ko DOAA canteen, aur raat ko CCD, maja hi aa jaata tha.

Civil ki labs mai saath mai ghisa hai, aur saath mai fraud bhi maara. Assignment saath mai chaapa krte the. 4-5 baar gym ka subscription le liya tha, pr ek baar nhi dhang se nhi gyağŸ˜‚. Aur wo red leggings ğŸ˜‚. Kaafi memories hai. Pizza with "Jalpanenos", brownie with 2 coups of ice cream, crotia jaana, mingling with Spanish twins etc.

Kaafi sahi banda hai yaar tu, bas sophisticated mt ban jaana peer pressure mai, teri harkate hi to speciality hai. Aur haan possible hua to krte hai kaam phir se kisi project prğŸ˜

Bas milte hai kabhi, aur chalte hai trip pr.
author: Samarthya  Sahu
